author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diebold Nixdorf Qtrly GAAP Loss Per Share Of $0.94
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Diebold Nixdorf Inc:
* DIEBOLD NIXDORF REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* QTRLY REVENUE OF $1.1 BILLION, DOWN 3.5% ON AN AS-REPORTED BASIS
* QTRLY ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * REAFFIRMS 2018 NON-GAAP OUTLOOK
* COMPANY UPDATES NET INCOME OUTLOOK FOR 2018 * SEES 2018 GAAP EPS IN RANGE OF LOSS OF $0.95 TO LOSS OF $1.25
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EPS IN RANGE OF $1.00 - $1.30
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.16 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
